snippet.title: Humanitz - Official Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2022
snippet.description:
HumanitZ is a top-down, open-world zombie survival shooter set a few years after the outbreak. Survive, explore, scavenge, build, craft, hunt, farm, fish and more. Do all this alone or with other survivors. You can't change the past.... Live for today!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1766060/HumanitZ/

#IGN #Gaming #IGNSummerOfGaming
